mapper.insert: insert into user_mst( main_username, oauth_username, user_provider, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_birthdate, user_email, create_date, update_date ) values( #{main_username}, #{oauth_username}, #{user_provider}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_birthdate}, #{user_email}, now(), now() )
